pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Python SDK for Xata[![Documentation Status](https://readthedocs.org/projects/xata-py/badge/?version=latest)](https://xata-py.readthedocs.io/en/latest/?badge=latest) [![PyPI version](https://badge.fury.io/py/xata.svg)](https://badge.fury.io/py/xata)Simple Python client for xata.io databases. Currently work in progress.Xata is a Serverless Database that is as easy to use as a spreadsheet, has thedata integrity of PostgreSQL, and the search and analytics functionality ofElasticsearch.The Python SDK uses type annotations and requires Python 3.8 or higher.To install, run:```pip install xata```To learn more about Xata, visit [xata.io](https://xata.io).- Python client documentation: https://xata-py.readthedocs.io- API Reference: https://xata-py.readthedocs.io/en/latest/api.html
